mapper.select: SELECT U_INTG_ID , U_NAME , U_NICKNAME , U_LAST_LOGIN_IP , DATE_FORMAT(U_LAST_LOGIN_DTTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as U_LAST_LOGIN_DTTM , U_LAST_TERMINAL_KIND , U_LOGIN_CATE , U_STATE_CD , U_TYPE_CD FROM USER WHERE U_INTG_ID = #{uIntgId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( U_INTG_ID, U_NAME, U_NICKNAME, U_LAST_LOGIN_IP, U_LAST_LOGIN_DTTM, U_LAST_TERMINAL_KIND, U_LOGIN_CATE, U_STATE_CD, U_TYPE_CD, U_REG_ID, U_REG_DATE, U_MOD_ID, U_MOD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{uIntgId}, #{uName}, NULL, #{uLastLoginIp}, NOW(), #{uLastTerminalKind}, NULL, #{uStateCd}, #{uTypeCd}, 'SYSTEM', NOW(), 'SYSTEM', NOW() )
